sections.description: Connect Range Reserver with third party services like Google calendar, Twilio, iCal, WooCommerce etc.
sections.changelog:
0.16.1

Changed way of embedding PayPal code into page to resolve issues with themes like Twenty Twenty-Two

0.15.4

Fixed issue with WooCommerce checkout that fails with error.

0.15.3

Fixed issue with paypal button and php warning notification.

Fixed issue with PHP8 and Google Calendar

0.15.1

PayPal: added option to customize switch label for selecting pay via paypal or pay in store

0.15.0

Added new SMS provider (OMNICOM) and Mail reminders if you want to send mails instead of SMS messages

0.14.0

Twilio Added Follow Up template SMS

0.13.3

PayPal prevent payment before validating Google reCaptcha

0.13.2

Fixed issue with missing PayPal button

0.13.1

Fixed issue with PHP Warning message.

0.13.0

PayPal: Added option for Smart button payment.

0.12.5

Google Calendar: Now every email from appointment will be added as attendee to Google Calendar meeting

0.12.4

Google Calendar > Added action link tags for google calendar subject and description sync

Google Calendar: fixed issue with empty name on sync back from Google Calendar

0.12.3

WooCommerce: fixed issue with fatal error.

0.12.1

Google Sync: Added option to copy previous field values when fetching new Events created on Google Calendar based on matching email with current EA bookings.

0.12.0

Fixed issue with price override with default value during sync with Google Calendar.

Fixed conflict issues with other plugins that used different version of Google SDK (SMTP Plugin etc)

0.11.9

Added option for Description field inside Google Calendar settings. Now you can customize description of events.

0.11.8

Updated dependencies

0.11.7

Added new option for settings timezone inside ICS file for email

0.11.6

Added Indian rupee to PayPal Currency list

0.11.5

Small fix regarding PayPal.

0.11.4

Fixed issue with PayPal script and tags

Fixed issue with SMS and timezone values for appointment start and end time.

0.11.3

Improvements regarding ICS date time formatting.

0.11.1

Added select for Payment method when PayPal checkout is not mandatory.

0.11.0

Update for WooCommerce integration. Fixed issue with status change before payment.

0.10.11

Fix for JPY currency and PayPal

Style improvements

0.10.10

Fix for remove Appointment error during EA Sync from Google Calendar

0.10.9

Removed debug log

0.10.8

Added support for Google Calendar all-day events sync.

0.10.7

Fixed issue with SMS reminder message and status issue. Now SMS reminder will only be triggered by confirmed appointments.

0.10.4

New Feature: Twilio SMS Limit per month option.

0.10.3

New Feature: Twilio SMS Template for reminder. Now there is a custom template for reminder, if it's empty and reminder is set. Confirmed reminder template will be used instead.

0.10.2

Fixed issue with missing data for Google Calendar events

0.10.1

Fixed issue with Google Calendar sync and duplication of some Google Events.

0.10.0

Google Calendar sync improvements. Now deleting event from Google Calendar will trigger customer mail notification after sync.

PayPal: added option for checkout button style.

0.9.12

PayPal: Allow buyers to pay with their credit or debit card (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and so on) OPTION.

0.9.11

Fixed issue with SMS reminder.

0.9.10

Fixed issue with Missing third param inside Error

0.9.9

Fixed Issue with missing Twilio files

0.9.8

Fixed issue with PayPal button and form validation. Also fixed issue with $0 services and PayPal error.

0.9.7

Fixed issue with Twilio send to field that didn't show saved value.

0.9.6

Fixed issue with short term token instead of long term token for Google authorization

0.9.5

Twilio: Added country code prefix field.

Fixed issue with WordPress located inside sub-folder.

0.9.4

Added sync for Google Events that are lasting for more then one day.

0.9.3

Improved class loading for vendor libs.

0.9.2

Added option for adding ICS attachment in Admin email notifications

Fixed issue with ICS file path

0.9.1

Fixed issue with SSL and Google Authorization

0.9.0

Improved WooCommerce - now when customer finish creation of the order it will automatically change status from pending to confirmed for that Appointments

Added date/time formatting for Twilio SMS notifications

0.8.5

Fixed issue with ICS file generation.

0.8.4

NEW - PayPal not required payment option

Small bug fixes

0.8.3

Bug fix regarding Google Calendar events that keep syncing multiple times

Sync process improvements.

0.8.2

Bug fix for Google Calendar sync. There was a bug that was only showing on large number of sync events. Please update

0.8.0

Added PayPal support

Google Calendar - turn on/off usage of customers email while creating Event in Google Calendar as attendee

0.7.5

Polylang bugfix issue

0.7.4

Small bug fix

0.7.3

Remove Google token fix.

0.7.2

Bug fixes, show error notice if google token is not valid etc.

0.7.1

Cron status indicator

0.7.0

NEW - Multiple Google Calendars sync option. Now you can set different settings for each Calendar and sync back separate services location and workers.

0.6.3

NEW - iCalendar option. Send ICS along customers email and let them easily add Appointments to their calendars.
